TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientRemotingConfig extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义一个静态 方法，该方法创建适合于客户端类型库的客户端远程处理配置文件。

span.span: Defines a static method that creates a client remoting configuration file for a client type library.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由类使用，它 从使用 .tlb 扩展名) (的客户端类型库生成 COM 接口。The method is used by the class while generating a COM interface from a client type library (with a .tlb extension). 类在启用 SOAP 的 COM + 应用程序中发布 COM 接口。The class publishes COM interfaces in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application. 此方法的参数之一是包含公共语言运行时的程序集的名称， (CLR) 已 为客户端类型库生成的元数据。One of the method's parameters is the name of an assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata that has already generated for the client type library. 不需要直接调用。 does not need to be called directly. 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 由 .NET Framework 在内部使用。 is used internally by the .NET Framework. 不需要直接在代码中使用类。You do not need to use the class directly in your code.

param.span: 用于创建配置文件的文件夹。

span.span: The folder in which to create the configuration file.
The name of the virtual root.

span.span: The base URL that contains the virtual root.

param.name: AssemblyName
param.span: 包含与类型库对应的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 元数据的程序集的显示名称。

span.span: The display name of the assembly that contains common language runtime (CLR) metadata corresponding to the type library.

param.name: TypeName
param.span: 包含与类型库对应的 CLR 元数据的程序集的完全限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the assembly that contains CLR metadata corresponding to the type library.
The programmatic identifier of the class.

summary.span: 在启用 SOAP 的 COM+ 应用程序中创建适合于客户端类型库的客户端远程处理配置文件。

span.span: Creates a client remoting configuration file for a client type library in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application.

returns.span: 如果成功创建了客户端远程处理配置文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client remoting configuration file was successfully created; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从使用 .tlb 扩展名) (的客户端类型库生成 COM 接口时，将调用静态方法。The static method is called by the class while generating a COM interface from a client type library (with a .tlb extension). 类在启用 SOAP 的 COM + 应用程序中发布 COM 接口。The class publishes COM interfaces in a SOAP-enabled COM+ application. 不需要直接调用。 does not need to be called directly. 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. `BaseUrl` `VRoot` 如果需要，和参数值将与路径分隔符连接 (，) 形成客户端元素的 `URL` 属性值。The `BaseUrl` and `VRoot` parameter values are concatenated (with a path separator, if needed) to form the client element's `URL` attribute value. `AssemblyName`参数 使用已 为客户端类型库生成的、使用类的程序集标识包含 CLR 元数据的程序集。The `AssemblyName` parameter identifies an assembly containing CLR metadata that , using the class, has already generated for the client type library.
